definition: To separate or detach something, often by undoing a connection or solving a problem. It is commonly used when referring to unfastening, untangling, or resolving a situation or puzzle.

examples.german: Die Medikamente können die Schmerzen lösen.
examples.english: The medication can relieve the pain.
He was able to untie the knot.

examples.german: Die Spannung wurde gelöst, als er die Wahrheit erfuhr.
examples.english: The tension was relieved when he learned the truth.
